content.text1: We exist to grow loving communities of Jesus-followers who live and share his irreligious message.
Thank you for being part of the 3,500+ people who gave this past year to support our vision. Together, this looks like:

list.title: Compassion & Local Agency Support
list.text: Supporting people in our own communities and around the world through local initiatives and our through partnerships with World Vision, Mennonite Central Committee (MCC), and BIC Canada Global. 15% - $1,618,404
list.imageAlt: Young woman sitting at a table and looking at her notes from Sunday teaching at The Meeting House.

list.title: Kids & Youth
list.text: Discipling our kids and youth through curriculum production, programming, staffing, classroom supplies, and subsidies for our youth retreats. 13% - $1,378,676
list.imageAlt: Screen shot of Bruxy teaching during Sunday morning livestream at The Meeting House.

list.title: Adult Ministries
list.text: Funding Home Church, local events, volunteer training and appreciation, plus resourcing and salaries for our parish pastors. 22% - $2,334,841
list.imageAlt: Team of pastors from The Meeting House sitting around a table and recording a podcast.

list.title: Shared Ministry Expenses
list.text: Resourcing and training for our staff team and covering administrative costs and salaries for our senior pastors, IT, accounting, and HR staff. 12% - $1,304,211
list.imageAlt: Kids gathering around a smartphone to watch a video from The Meeting House Kids and Youth curriculum.

list.title: Facilities & Rent
list.text: Renting spaces for Sunday mornings, meetings, and rehearsals and funding storage facilities, utilities, and maintenance at the Oakville facility. 17% - $1,839,981
list.imageAlt: Kids gathering around a smartphone to watch a video from The Meeting House Kids and Youth curriculum.

list.title: Communications & Weekend Service
list.text: Producing and distributing Sunday teaching to our parish and online community and funding tech, parish support, and communications staff. 16% - $1,699,785
list.imageAlt: Kids gathering around a smartphone to watch a video from The Meeting House Kids and Youth curriculum.

list.title: Jesus Collective
list.text: Resourcing and training for our staff team and covering administrative costs and salaries for our senior pastors, IT, accounting, and HR staff. 5% - $542,360
list.imageAlt: Planning, promoting, and organizing the framework for Jesus Collective’s pilot phase and inviting other leaders and churches to join.

content.header1: Our impact is measured by His hands and feet.
